body.description: AC Powered with Battery Backup Settings Plug it in for All Functions Working This desk alarms clock is outlet operated, it means you need to plug it into a 100~240V AC wall power outlet with the included cable and adapter for all functions working. Battery Backup Alarm and Time Settings This travel alarm clock also allows you to insert 2pcs “AAA” size batteries to the battery compartment to backup alarm and time settings in case of AC power failure. Batteries are not included and do not support time display, but they can back up time & alarm setting and trigger an alarm even in the event of a power failure!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: PPLEE Digital Dual Alarm Clock for Bedroom - Easy to Set, Great for Gifts! Nice Alarm Clock with 2 Alarms & Battery Backup. Cool Stuff for Your Room. This is a very simple alarm clock, without those dazzling complex features, but enough to meet our daily needs. Focusing on the alarm clock itself makes our lives easier! Some main features you may want to know: 1> Bedroom clock with dual alarms - it allows you to set 2 different alarms for you and your family members. 2> Large display alarm clock with 7 inch big screen for checking time across the room. 3> Loud alarm clock for heavy sleepers with 4-Level adjustable alarm volume - different people have different sensitivity to the volume of alarm clocks, set your own volume to a more acceptable level. 4> LED digital clock with 5-Level digits brightness dimmer - you may need it to be brighter at day for clearly watching, but dim enough for not bothering your sleep at night. 5> Alarm clock with USB charger - for charging your cellphone or other devices while using this bedside alarm clock. 6> Outlet powered with battery backup settings - need to plug it in for functions working properly, you can also insert 2*AAA size battery to backup time & alarm setting in case of a power outage. 7> Kids alarm clock with SNOOZE function gives you an extra 9 mins sleep before alerting you again. 8> 12-hour or 24-hour Time Format and DST - Daylight Saving Time are also available.

Alarm Clock with 2 Alarms for Different Time Schedule Considering that despite being a family, everyone will still have different schedules, we designed this loud dual alarms clock to be able to set 2 separately alarms. Wake up at your own alarm time and go do your own things, your partner will wake up at his/her own alarm time. When alarm goes off, you can Press “SNOOZE” button on the top to turn off the alarm for 9 minutes, this means the alarm will ring every next 9 minutes.Press “ALM PAUSE” button to turn off the alarm for 24 hours, the alarm is still activated and will ring after 24 hours.Press the “ALM OFF” button to cancel alarm forever, this means the alarm will never ring in the future unless you set a new alarm.

AC Powered with Battery Backup Settings Plug it in for All Functions Working This desk alarms clock is outlet operated, it means you need to plug it into a 100~240V AC wall power outlet with the included cable and adapter for all functions working. Battery Backup Alarm and Time Settings This travel alarm clock also allows you to insert 2pcs “AAA” size batteries to the battery compartment to backup alarm and time settings in case of AC power failure. Batteries are not included and do not support time display, but they can back up time & alarm setting and trigger an alarm even in the event of a power failure! Products Features Can set 2 different alarms time 4 levels adjustable alarm volume 5 levels adjustable digits brightness dimmer USB phone charger Outlet operated with battery backup settings Snooze, 12/24H, DST Easy to set for kids teens seniors boys girls Suitable for bedroom, home, kitchen, office

Some Practical Small Functions Add Convenience to Life 9 Mins SNOOZE Function & USB Charging Port This kids bedroom alarm clock gives you extra 9 minutes sleep with the big "SNOOZE" button before alerting you again. Give yourself a buffer before you get up. This bedside alarm clock also has a built-in phone charger for charging and playing your iPhone, Android, Samsung cellphones and other tablets at the same time. Adjust Your Own Acceptable Volume & Dimmer Everyone has a different sensitivity to the volume of this loud alarm clock and the brightness of the screen. This teens boys girls alarm clock allows you to adjust the alarm volume and brightness yourself. The button is clear to see and operation is simple. Adjust the Time Format According to Your Personal Habits Some may be used to 12-hour time format while some like the 24-hour time format, this easy to set seniors alarm clock allows you to adjust the time format according to your personal habits. Hold press "DST' button, you can also adjust the Daylight Saving Time.

Take One for Yourself and Get One for Your Friends We use alarm clock frequently no matter in the life or the work. PPLEE also has some alarm clocks which have some complex functions for special users, while this one is designed to be a basic and simple operation clock for home. For more alarm clock styles, please visit our PPLEE store.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 21, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice Basic Alarm Clock
reviews.reviewText: I previously had a radio/alarm clock with battery backup where the battery backup stopped working. We have frequent power interruptions, so I wanted an alarm with battery backup. I don't ever use the radio feature, so one with just alarm was sufficient. And I like having two alarm settings. This clock fit the bill at a reasonable price, and other reviews seemed good. I like that all the routinely used time and alarm controls are easily accessible on the top. Some other alarm clocks have these settings on the back, which is inconvenient. The clock and alarm times are easy to set, and controls are obvious and intuitive. The "Dimmer" button allows you to easily adjust the brightness of the display. When Alarm 1 and/or 2 is set, little images appear on the left side of the screen showing they are on. Pressing the "Alarm Off" button turns these off (press once if only one alarm is set, press again if both are set). To set the alarms, press the one you want to set (Alarm 1 or Alarm 2), and the display will start flashing. Use the hour and minute buttons to set. Once set, the time will continue to flash for a few seconds then hold at what you set. Or you can press the alarm button again or the "Snooze/OK" button to stop the flashing and register your setting. You can adjust the alarm volume with the Volume +/- buttons on the left side of the clock. A tone is sounded each time you press so you can hear the volume. When the alarm goes off, pressing the Snooze button will give you an extra 9 minutes until it goes off again. Or you can press the "Alarm Pause" or "Alarm Off" button. "Alarm Pause" turns off the particular alarm (1 or 2) for 24 hours so it won't beep again until the next day. "Alarm Off" turns it off so it won’t beep again until you turn it back on. Once you set times for the Alarm 1 and Alarm 2, these times are retained each time you turn them off and back on, unless you change them. (This seems obvious, but I mention it only because one review I read seemed to indicate this might not be the case.) You can tell if Alarm 1 and/or 2 is set to go off by whether the small icons on the left side of the screen are showing. If an alarm is off, just press the Alarm 1 and/or 2 button to turn back on. The icon will then display on the screen.There is a button on the right side of the clock to toggle modes between either 12 hour (AM/PM) or 24 hour (e.g., military time). Also, if you hold this button in for about 3 seconds, it will add an hour to the current time and display a little "DST" (daylight savings time) symbol on the right side of the face (i.e., "Spring forward"). Pressing it again for about 3 seconds will subtract an hour and remove the DST symbol (i.e., "Fall back"). This saves having to re-set the time twice a year. All very logical and intuitive.One other thing to mention. Several unboxing videos by some reviewers seem to wonder what the two little black square pieces are that are packaged with the clock. I'm not sure why this seems confusing. These are obviously feet. They each have a little post on them, and there are a couple of holes in the back of the clock to insert them. These are easy to insert and fit snugly. They provide a little more width to the base to make the clock more stable, so it won't tip over when you go to hit the Snooze or Alarm Pause or Off buttons.The only slight negative observation I have is that the display can be a little glary and washed out in bright sunlight when viewed from across the room. Making the display brighter helps, but then it is too bright if you wake up and look at the time during the night. As a result, I tend to set the display brightness towards one of the middle settings. This is obviously a personal preference that will vary. All-in-all, this is a nice little alarm clock with big numbers that are easy to read without glasses at a very reasonable/inexpensive price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use, great display
reviews.reviewText: This clock has a nice big display that you can make low or bright. Also love that you can make alarm loud and that you can set two alarms and also charge your phone!. Great price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought two of them. Kids loved them. Not too bright. Just enough

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Alarm Clock.
reviews.reviewText: This thin rectangular clock is 3.5" tall, 7" long, and 1.5 inches wide. I love it because the buttons are on top, in a row, that is clearly marked what their functions are. I love the 5 levels of light adjustment. The alarm sound is not obnoxious. It comes with two square pegs that you insert into the lower back of the clock to help stabilize it. The letters are large and easy to read at night. There is nothing that I do not like about this alarm clock.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great bedside alarm clock!
reviews.reviewText: So easy to set. Best feature for me is the dimmer. Small clock with big display. Backup battery. Awesome value, too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I wanted a clock with just the absolute basics, so I chose this one.The display is nice and bright (I bought the white display, blue on black seemed dimmer). Setting the time and alarms took maybe a minute.This is a nitpick, but I was slightly confused to see that turning off the alarm is "Alarm Pause" and erasing the alarm is "Alarm Off." I can see myself deleting the alarm I set while I'm still in my morning haze.Speaking of the alarm, it's LOUD. It doesn't seem that loud when you're setting it up, but it packs a real punch when you're half asleep and hungover. I'm such a heavy sleeper I usually have to use puzzle alarms, but this clock's shrill awful noises are almost magical in how fast they get me out of bed.I have no use/need for the USB charging port so I can't comment on it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Can't be beat for the money.
reviews.reviewText: This is the most perfect mid-size clock. I needed something that I could read across the room without any frills or additional adornment and this is perfect. I was able to adjust the brightness effortlessly. I was amazed at the price. It's very sleek and blends into the background. Perfect.
